channel.title: Artim's GunGame
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/tlJQAWU.png[/img] You kill Bots in the minigame and pickup their loot (food,pots,runes,arrows and armour)
After every kill your weapon upgrades for example, first kill bronze sword second kill bronze longsword. You also receive 1 "BotPoint" which can be used in the shop where you can buy primal and mystery boxes. You will lose your primal if you die in the minigame Primal aint that expensive its 10-25 points per piece depends what piece you're buying. But you will keep mystery boxes if you die in the minigame mystery boxes can give stuffs from Logs to Custom weapons. [b]Bots names are based on our staff/development team.[/b]
Some media: [img]http://i.imgur.com/61oSENS.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/3zBcE3j.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/4uKYjKG.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/yb1MmDH.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/41zfuCj.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/8nUl055.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/MxbaYGh.png[/img] [b]Starting gear[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/8s6dLcJ.png[/img][/center]

item.title: Artim's GunGame
item.dc:creator: @Project_Runescape Project Runescape
item.description:
@Project_Runescape wrote:

[center]
You kill Bots in the minigame and pickup their loot (food,pots,runes,arrows and armour)

After every kill your weapon upgrades for example, first kill bronze sword second kill bronze longsword.
You also receive 1 “BotPoint” which can be used in the shop where you can buy primal and mystery boxes.
You will lose your primal if you die in the minigame Primal aint that expensive its 10-25 points per piece depends what piece you’re buying.
But you will keep mystery boxes if you die in the minigame mystery boxes can give stuffs from Logs to Custom weapons.
Bots names are based on our staff/development team.

Some media:


Starting gear
[/center]
